description: This file declares the exported API functions for the Slap Loam Server component within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) framework. It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the server object.

methods.name: SlapCreateLoamServer
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Slap Loam Server object with specified context handles.

methods.name: SlapLsoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Slap Loam Server object.

methods.name: SlapLsoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the Slap Loam Server object.

methods.name: SlapLsoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrols necessary objects into the Slap Loam Server.

methods.name: SlapLsoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Loam Server object.
